question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding  HIV/AIDS Prevention Act, 2017?
1. It penalises propagation of hate against HIV/AIDS affected persons.
2. It ensures the right of HIV/AIDS affected minors to shared household.
3. It protects non-disclosure of HIV/AIDS status in the absence of court order.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
Some of the objectives of  HIV/AIDS Prevention Act, 2017 include:
1. It penalises propagation of hate against HIV/AIDS affected persons.
2. It ensures the right of HIV/AIDS affected minors to shared household.
3. It protects non-disclosure of HIV/AIDS status in the absence of court order
